name: Shrinky Planet
description:
The game is a low poly style battle royale game. in wich you're a paperbag fighting against other paperbags untill one last man stands.

The game is in early development and you can download a working prototype. if you want us to continue working on this project feel free to comment down below (you can even leave suggestions).

Lan Only (for now)

Controls

  • Movement = WASD / Arrowkeys
  • Fire = LeftClick Shoot
  • Secret #1 = i
  • Secret #2 = T

Credits

  • Networking: Seppe Roelandt & Gilles Vancoillie
  • Models: Seppe Roelandt, Ischa Soetewey, Titi-Lola Kuku
  • Coding:Taho Vindevogel, Gilles Vancoillie, Quinten DS, Seppe Roelandt
  • Sound Design: Ischa Soetewey, Titi-Lola Kuku
  • Character Design: Quinten DS
